009package ImageJ_Demos;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016/**
017 * This ImageJ plugin modifies and re-displays the current image 
018 * repeatedly.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public class UpdateAndDraw_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
024        
025        ImagePlus im;
026
027        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
028                this.im = im;           // keep reference to associated ImagePlus
029                return DOES_ALL;        // this plugin accepts any image
030        }
031
032        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
033                for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
034                        // modify this image:
035                        ip.smooth();
036                        ip.rotate(30);
037                        // redisplay this image:
038                        im.updateAndDraw();
039                        // sleep so user can watch this:
040                        IJ.wait(100);
041                }
042        }
043}
